item.title: Compression of code
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

hi im working on flething with frames

when i add this to the actionbutton case 185 it doesnt work

if(playerLevel[9] >= 10) { deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 10); addItem(48, 10); addSkillXP(100, 9); } else { sendMessage("You need a fletching level of 5 to make this bow."); } closeInterface(); break;

and when i do this it works fine

[code]if(playerLevel[9] >= 10) {
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);
deleteItem(1511, getItemSlot(1511), 1);

addItem(48, 10);

} else {

}
closeInterface();
break;[/code]

how can i compress the code so it works right
